About Me

  • Video Games Fan, especially FPS Games, huge BattleField Fan.
  • Like Running, average distance 15km per week, average pace 5min/km

An online coding course website.

A marketplace of a card game.
I was part of frontend team, took charge in implementing UI design and functionality and also project struct.
It lets user view, list, sell, buy cards from each other.
Uses Vue, Vuex, Vue Router, BootStrap-vue, BootStrap, SCSS, Solidity, Golang.
